## Challenge 1
load(tidyverse)
f <- read.delim("darwin.txt", header = TRUE)
length(f)
length(f[[1]])
p34 <- slice(f,34)
print(p34)
split <- str_split(p34, boundary("word"), n = Inf, simplify = FALSE)
split
word_list <- as.data.frame(table(split))
word_list
length(word_list[[1]])
hightolow <- word_list[order(-word_list$Freq),]
hightolow
hightolow[1, ]
freq1 <- filter(hightolow, Freq == 1)
length(freq1[[1]])
freq5 <- filter(hightolow, Freq >= 5)
length(freq5[[1]])
p56 <- slice(f,56)
final_quote <- tibble(p56[[1]])
print(final_quote)
split_quote <- str_split(final_quote, boundary("word"), n = Inf, simplify = FALSE)

new3col <- matrix(
  data = split_quote[[1]],
  nrow = round(222/3),
  ncol = 3,
  byrow = TRUE
)
every_third <- new3col[,3]
print(every_third)
every_third <- sort(every_third, decreasing = TRUE)
print(every_third)
